meta.description: Optimize the scheduling of in-vivo and ex-vivo experiments to minimize radiation exposure.

sets.name: EXPERIMENTS
sets.description: Types of experiments to be scheduled.

params.name: prep_time
params.description: Preparation time required for each type of experiment in minutes.

params.name: exec_time
params.description: Execution time required for each type of experiment in minutes.

params.name: radiation
params.description: Radiation units received from each type of experiment.

vars.name: num_experiments
vars.description: Number of each type of experiment to be scheduled.

objective.name: min_total_radiation
objective.description: Minimize the total radiation received from all scheduled experiments.

constraints.name: prep_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total preparation time for all experiments must not exceed 400 minutes.

constraints.name: exec_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total execution time for all experiments must not exceed 500 minutes.
